metadata.desc: You love nature, traveling and discovering new exciting places - Explore BG will guide you on  your journey into the unknown.

section-top.h1: Looking for adventures or just want to visit a new place
section-top.h2: Explore BG is the perfect choice

quote.text: If we were meant to stay in one place, we'd have roots instead of feet.
quote.author: Rachel Wolchin

section-2.title: The Devil's bridge
section-2.text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Tenetur minima natus delectus temporibus, voluptatibus eveniet ut minus alias cumque soluta adipisci repudiandae at, vel quos quod impedit repellendus praesentium voluptatum.

trail-create.trail-info-info: Share the details of your favorite trail with us—describe the scenery, the difficulty level, any wildlife you encountered, and the special moments that made your hike memorable. Your insights could inspire fellow hikers and help them discover new paths to explore!
trail-create.photos-message: You can add photos after create this trail.
trail-create.err-place-regex: Valid characters include A-z and space (not in the beginning)!
trail-create.err-place-length: Length should be between {minLength} and {maxLength} symbols!
trail-create.err-total-distance: Total distance should be number greater than 0!
trail-create.err-total-elevation: Elevation gained should be number greater than 0!
trail-create.err-activity: Please enter at least one activity!
trail-create.err-next-to-required: Please enter town or city name that is close to the trail!
trail-create.err-trail-info-required: Please enter a short description of the trail!
trail-create.err-trail-info-regex: Valid characters include A-z 0-9 ( ) : ; ' ` ? ! - . , space and new line
trail-create.err-trail-info-max-length: The trail info text shouldn't exceed {maxLength} characters!

pop-up.require-auth-message: Only logged in users can open this page!
pop-up.del-question: Are you sure you want to delete
pop-up.pass-info: Password should contain at least one uppercase, lowercase, digit, special character {spChars} and must be at least {minLength} characters!

login-register.err-username-start-with: Username should start with English letter!
login-register.err-username-contain: Username should contain only English letters, numbers and underscore!
login-register.err-username-min-length: Username must contain at least {minLength} characters!
login-register.err-pass-lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter!
login-register.err-pass-uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter!
login-register.err-pass-number: Password must contain at least one number!
login-register.err-pass-special-char: Password must contain at least one special character!
login-register.err-pass-min-length: Password must contain at least {minLength} characters!

my-profile.title: My Profile
my-profile.be-valid-err-gender: Field gender can not be blank!
my-profile.err-info-max-length: Text field can be maximum {maxLength} characters!

not-found.title: Not Found
not-found.text: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.
